prompt:
If modifying a WezTerm config file (.wezterm.lua), first verify a dated backup exists for today. If no backup exists, create one before making changes:

Linux/macOS: cp ~/.wezterm.lua ~/.wezterm.lua.bak.$(date +%Y-%m-%d)
Windows (Git Bash): cp ~/.wezterm.lua ~/.wezterm.lua.bak.$(date +%Y-%m-%d)

Only proceed with the edit after confirming the backup exists or creating one.
